verses.text_plain: Then Solomon assembled the elders of Israel, and all the heads of the tribes, the chief of the fathers of the children of Israel, unto king Solomon in Jerusalem, that they might bring up the ark of the covenant of the Lord out of the city of David, which is Zion.
verses.verse_html:
1Then Solomon assembled the elders of Israel, and all the heads of the tribes, the chief of the fathers of the children of Israel, unto king Solomon in Jerusalem, that they might bring up the ark of the covenant of the Lord out of the city of David, which is Zion. ▼
▼ chief: Heb. princes

verses.text_plain: And all the men of Israel assembled themselves unto king Solomon at the feast in the month Ethanim, which is the seventh month.
verses.verse_html: 2And all the men of Israel assembled themselves unto king Solomon at the feast in the month Ethanim, which is the seventh month.

verses.text_plain: And all the elders of Israel came, and the priests took up the ark.
verses.verse_html: 3And all the elders of Israel came, and the priests took up the ark.

verses.text_plain: And they brought up the ark of the Lord, and the tabernacle of the congregation, and all the holy vessels that were in the tabernacle, even those did the priests and the Levites bring up.
verses.verse_html: 4And they brought up the ark of the Lord, and the tabernacle of the congregation, and all the holy vessels that were in the tabernacle, even those did the priests and the Levites bring up.

verses.text_plain: And king Solomon, and all the congregation of Israel, that were assembled unto him, were with him before the ark, sacrificing sheep and oxen, that could not be told nor numbered for multitude.
verses.verse_html: 5And king Solomon, and all the congregation of Israel, that were assembled unto him, were with him before the ark, sacrificing sheep and oxen, that could not be told nor numbered for multitude.

verses.text_plain: And the priests brought in the ark of the covenant of the Lord unto his place, into the oracle of the house, to the most holy place, even under the wings of the cherubims.
verses.verse_html: 6And the priests brought in the ark of the covenant of the Lord unto his place, into the oracle of the house, to the most holy place, even under the wings of the cherubims.

verses.text_plain: For the cherubims spread forth their two wings over the place of the ark, and the cherubims covered the ark and the staves thereof above.
verses.verse_html: 7For the cherubims spread forth their two wings over the place of the ark, and the cherubims covered the ark and the staves thereof above.

verses.text_plain: And they drew out the staves, that the ends of the staves were seen out in the holy place before the oracle, and they were not seen without: and there they are unto this day.
verses.verse_html:
8And they drew out the staves, that the ends of the staves were seen out in the holy place before the oracle, and they were not seen without: and there they are unto this day. ▼
▼ ends: Heb. heads
 , ▼
▼ holy…: or, ark

tokens.text: and there they are unto this day

verses.text_plain: There was nothing in the ark save the two tables of stone, which Moses put there at Horeb, when the Lord made a covenant with the children of Israel, when they came out of the land of Egypt.
verses.verse_html:
9There was nothing in the ark save the two tables of stone, which Moses put there at Horeb, when the Lord made a covenant with the children of Israel, when they came out of the land of Egypt. ▼
▼ when the: or, where the

footnotes.body_html: ▼ when the: or, where the

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when the priests were come out of the holy place, that the cloud filled the house of the Lord,
verses.verse_html: 10And it came to pass, when the priests were come out of the holy place, that the cloud filled the house of the Lord,

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when the priests

verses.text_plain: So that the priests could not stand to minister because of the cloud: for the glory of the Lord had filled the house of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 11So that the priests could not stand to minister because of the cloud: for the glory of the Lord had filled the house of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Then spake Solomon, The Lord said that he would dwell in the thick darkness.
verses.verse_html: 12Then spake Solomon, The Lord said that he would dwell in the thick darkness.

verses.text_plain: I have surely built thee an house to dwell in, a settled place for thee to abide in for ever.
verses.verse_html: 13I have surely built thee an house to dwell in, a settled place for thee to abide in for ever.

verses.text_plain: And the king turned his face about, and blessed all the congregation of Israel: (and all the congregation of Israel stood;)
verses.verse_html: 14And the king turned his face about, and blessed all the congregation of Israel: (and all the congregation of Israel stood;)

verses.text_plain: And he said, Blessed be the Lord God of Israel, which spake with his mouth unto David my father, and hath with his hand fulfilled it, saying,
verses.verse_html: 15And he said, Blessed be the Lord God of Israel, which spake with his mouth unto David my father, and hath with his hand fulfilled it, saying,

verses.text_plain: Since the day that I brought forth my people Israel out of Egypt, I chose no city out of all the tribes of Israel to build an house, that my name might be therein; but I chose David to be over my people Israel.
verses.verse_html: 16Since the day that I brought forth my people Israel out of Egypt, I chose no city out of all the tribes of Israel to build an house, that my name might be therein; but I chose David to be over my people Israel.

tokens.text: might be therein; but I chose

verses.text_plain: And it was in the heart of David my father to build an house for the name of the Lord God of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 17And it was in the heart of David my father to build an house for the name of the Lord God of Israel.

tokens.text: And it was in the heart

verses.text_plain: And the Lord said unto David my father, Whereas it was in thine heart to build an house unto my name, thou didst well that it was in thine heart.
verses.verse_html: 18And the Lord said unto David my father, Whereas it was in thine heart to build an house unto my name, thou didst well that it was in thine heart.

tokens.text: that it was in thine heart

verses.text_plain: Nevertheless thou shalt not build the house; but thy son that shall come forth out of thy loins, he shall build the house unto my name.
verses.verse_html: 19Nevertheless thou shalt not build the house; but thy son that shall come forth out of thy loins, he shall build the house unto my name.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord hath performed his word that he spake, and I am risen up in the room of David my father, and sit on the throne of Israel, as the Lord promised, and have built an house for the name of the Lord God of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 20And the Lord hath performed his word that he spake, and I am risen up in the room of David my father, and sit on the throne of Israel, as the Lord promised, and have built an house for the name of the Lord God of Israel.

verses.text_plain: And I have set there a place for the ark, wherein is the covenant of the Lord, which he made with our fathers, when he brought them out of the land of Egypt.
verses.verse_html: 21And I have set there a place for the ark, wherein is the covenant of the Lord, which he made with our fathers, when he brought them out of the land of Egypt.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon stood before the altar of the Lord in the presence of all the congregation of Israel, and spread forth his hands toward heaven:
verses.verse_html: 22And Solomon stood before the altar of the Lord in the presence of all the congregation of Israel, and spread forth his hands toward heaven:

verses.text_plain: And he said, Lord God of Israel, there is no God like thee, in heaven above, or on earth beneath, who keepest covenant and mercy with thy servants that walk before thee with all their heart:
verses.verse_html: 23And he said, Lord God of Israel, there is no God like thee, in heaven above, or on earth beneath, who keepest covenant and mercy with thy servants that walk before thee with all their heart:

verses.text_plain: Who hast kept with thy servant David my father that thou promisedst him: thou spakest also with thy mouth, and hast fulfilled it with thine hand, as it is this day.
verses.verse_html: 24Who hast kept with thy servant David my father that thou promisedst him: thou spakest also with thy mouth, and hast fulfilled it with thine hand, as it is this day.

verses.text_plain: Therefore now, Lord God of Israel, keep with thy servant David my father that thou promisedst him, saying, There shall not fail thee a man in my sight to sit on the throne of Israel; so that thy children take heed to their way, that they walk before me as thou hast walked before me.
verses.verse_html:
25Therefore now, Lord God of Israel, keep with thy servant David my father that thou promisedst him, saying, There shall not fail thee a man in my sight to sit on the throne of Israel; so that thy children take heed to their way, that they walk before me as thou hast walked before me. ▼
▼ fail…: Heb. be cut off unto thee a man from my sight
 , ▼
▼ so that: Heb. only if

footnotes.body_text: ▼ fail…: Heb. be cut off unto thee a man from my sight
footnotes.body_html: ▼ fail…: Heb. be cut off unto thee a man from my sight
▼ so that: Heb. only if

verses.text_plain: And now, O God of Israel, let thy word, I pray thee, be verified, which thou spakest unto thy servant David my father.
verses.verse_html: 26And now, O God of Israel, let thy word, I pray thee, be verified, which thou spakest unto thy servant David my father.

verses.text_plain: But will God indeed dwell on the earth? behold, the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house that I have builded?
verses.verse_html: 27But will God indeed dwell on the earth? behold, the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house that I have builded?

verses.text_plain: Yet have thou respect unto the prayer of thy servant, and to his supplication, O Lord my God, to hearken unto the cry and to the prayer, which thy servant prayeth before thee to day:
verses.verse_html: 28Yet have thou respect unto the prayer of thy servant, and to his supplication, O Lord my God, to hearken unto the cry and to the prayer, which thy servant prayeth before thee to day:

verses.text_plain: That thine eyes may be open toward this house night and day, even toward the place of which thou hast said, My name shall be there: that thou mayest hearken unto the prayer which thy servant shall make toward this place.
verses.verse_html:
29That thine eyes may be open toward this house night and day, even toward the place of which thou hast said, My name shall be there: that thou mayest hearken unto the prayer which thy servant shall make toward this place. ▼
▼ toward this place: or, in this place

tokens.text: shall be there: that thou mayest hearken

footnotes.body_text: ▼ toward this place: or, in this place
footnotes.body_html: ▼ toward this place: or, in this place

verses.text_plain: And hearken thou to the supplication of thy servant, and of thy people Israel, when they shall pray toward this place: and hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place: and when thou hearest, forgive.
verses.verse_html:
30And hearken thou to the supplication of thy servant, and of thy people Israel, when they shall pray toward this place: and hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place: and when thou hearest, forgive. ▼
▼ toward this place: or, in this place

footnotes.body_text: ▼ toward this place: or, in this place
footnotes.body_html: ▼ toward this place: or, in this place

verses.text_plain: If any man trespass against his neighbour, and an oath be laid upon him to cause him to swear, and the oath come before thine altar in this house:
verses.verse_html:
31If any man trespass against his neighbour, and an oath be laid upon him to cause him to swear, and the oath come before thine altar in this house: ▼
▼ and an oath…: Heb. and he require an oath of him

tokens.text: upon him to cause him to swear

footnotes.body_text: ▼ and an oath…: Heb. and he require an oath of him
footnotes.body_html: ▼ and an oath…: Heb. and he require an oath of him

verses.text_plain: Then hear thou in heaven, and do, and judge thy servants, condemning the wicked, to bring his way upon his head; and justifying the righteous, to give him according to his righteousness.
verses.verse_html: 32Then hear thou in heaven, and do, and judge thy servants, condemning the wicked, to bring his way upon his head; and justifying the righteous, to give him according to his righteousness.

verses.text_plain: When thy people Israel be smitten down before the enemy, because they have sinned against thee, and shall turn again to thee, and confess thy name, and pray, and make supplication unto thee in this house:
verses.verse_html:
33When thy people Israel be smitten down before the enemy, because they have sinned against thee, and shall turn again to thee, and confess thy name, and pray, and make supplication unto thee in this house: ▼
▼ in: or, toward

tokens.text: against thee, and shall turn again

verses.text_plain: Then hear thou in heaven, and forgive the sin of thy people Israel, and bring them again unto the land which thou gavest unto their fathers.
verses.verse_html: 34Then hear thou in heaven, and forgive the sin of thy people Israel, and bring them again unto the land which thou gavest unto their fathers.

verses.text_plain: When heaven is shut up, and there is no rain, because they have sinned against thee; if they pray toward this place, and confess thy name, and turn from their sin, when thou afflictest them:
verses.verse_html: 35When heaven is shut up, and there is no rain, because they have sinned against thee; if they pray toward this place, and confess thy name, and turn from their sin, when thou afflictest them:

verses.text_plain: Then hear thou in heaven, and forgive the sin of thy servants, and of thy people Israel, that thou teach them the good way wherein they should walk, and give rain upon thy land, which thou hast given to thy people for an inheritance.
verses.verse_html: 36Then hear thou in heaven, and forgive the sin of thy servants, and of thy people Israel, that thou teach them the good way wherein they should walk, and give rain upon thy land, which thou hast given to thy people for an inheritance.

verses.text_plain: If there be in the land famine, if there be pestilence, blasting, mildew, locust, or if there be caterpiller; if their enemy besiege them in the land of their cities; whatsoever plague, whatsoever sickness there be;
verses.verse_html:
37If there be in the land famine, if there be pestilence, blasting, mildew, locust, or if there be caterpiller; if their enemy besiege them in the land of their cities; whatsoever plague, whatsoever sickness there be; ▼
▼ cities: or, jurisdiction

tokens.text: If there be in the land

verses.text_plain: What prayer and supplication soever be made by any man, or by all thy people Israel, which shall know every man the plague of his own heart, and spread forth his hands toward this house:
verses.verse_html: 38What prayer and supplication soever be made by any man, or by all thy people Israel, which shall know every man the plague of his own heart, and spread forth his hands toward this house:

verses.text_plain: Then hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place, and forgive, and do, and give to every man according to his ways, whose heart thou knowest; (for thou, even thou only, knowest the hearts of all the children of men;)
verses.verse_html: 39Then hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place, and forgive, and do, and give to every man according to his ways, whose heart thou knowest; (for thou, even thou only, knowest the hearts of all the children of men;)

verses.text_plain: That they may fear thee all the days that they live in the land which thou gavest unto our fathers.
verses.verse_html: 40That they may fear thee all the days that they live in the land which thou gavest unto our fathers.

verses.text_plain: Moreover concerning a stranger, that is not of thy people Israel, but cometh out of a far country for thy name’s sake;
verses.verse_html: 41Moreover concerning a stranger, that is not of thy people Israel, but cometh out of a far country for thy name’s sake;

verses.text_plain: (For they shall hear of thy great name, and of thy strong hand, and of thy stretched out arm;) when he shall come and pray toward this house;
verses.verse_html: 42(For they shall hear of thy great name, and of thy strong hand, and of thy stretched out arm;) when he shall come and pray toward this house;

verses.text_plain: Hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place, and do according to all that the stranger calleth to thee for: that all people of the earth may know thy name, to fear thee, as do thy people Israel; and that they may know that this house, which I have builded, is called by thy name.
verses.verse_html:
43Hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place, and do according to all that the stranger calleth to thee for: that all people of the earth may know thy name, to fear thee, as do thy people Israel; and that they may know that this house, which I have builded, is called by thy name. ▼
▼ this…: Heb. thy name is called upon this house

tokens.text: according to all that the stranger
to thee for: that all people

footnotes.body_text: ▼ this…: Heb. thy name is called upon this house
footnotes.body_html: ▼ this…: Heb. thy name is called upon this house

verses.text_plain: If thy people go out to battle against their enemy, whithersoever thou shalt send them, and shall pray unto the Lord toward the city which thou hast chosen, and toward the house that I have built for thy name:
verses.verse_html:
44If thy people go out to battle against their enemy, whithersoever thou shalt send them, and shall pray unto the Lord toward the city which thou hast chosen, and toward the house that I have built for thy name: ▼
▼ toward the city: Heb. the way of the city

footnotes.body_text: ▼ toward the city: Heb. the way of the city
footnotes.body_html: ▼ toward the city: Heb. the way of the city

verses.text_plain: Then hear thou in heaven their prayer and their supplication, and maintain their cause.
verses.verse_html:
45Then hear thou in heaven their prayer and their supplication, and maintain their cause. ▼
▼ cause: or, right

verses.text_plain: If they sin against thee, (for there is no man that sinneth not,) and thou be angry with them, and deliver them to the enemy, so that they carry them away captives unto the land of the enemy, far or near;
verses.verse_html: 46If they sin against thee, (for there is no man that sinneth not,) and thou be angry with them, and deliver them to the enemy, so that they carry them away captives unto the land of the enemy, far or near;

tokens.text: so that they carry them away

verses.text_plain: Yet if they shall bethink themselves in the land whither they were carried captives, and repent, and make supplication unto thee in the land of them that carried them captives, saying, We have sinned, and have done perversely, we have committed wickedness;
verses.verse_html:
47Yet if they shall bethink themselves in the land whither they were carried captives, and repent, and make supplication unto thee in the land of them that carried them captives, saying, We have sinned, and have done perversely, we have committed wickedness; ▼
▼ bethink…: Heb. bring back to their heart

tokens.text: of them that carried them captives

footnotes.body_text: ▼ bethink…: Heb. bring back to their heart
footnotes.body_html: ▼ bethink…: Heb. bring back to their heart

verses.text_plain: And so return unto thee with all their heart, and with all their soul, in the land of their enemies, which led them away captive, and pray unto thee toward their land, which thou gavest unto their fathers, the city which thou hast chosen, and the house which I have built for thy name:
verses.verse_html: 48And so return unto thee with all their heart, and with all their soul, in the land of their enemies, which led them away captive, and pray unto thee toward their land, which thou gavest unto their fathers, the city which thou hast chosen, and the house which I have built for thy name:

tokens.text: unto thee with all their heart

verses.text_plain: Then hear thou their prayer and their supplication in heaven thy dwelling place, and maintain their cause,
verses.verse_html:
49Then hear thou their prayer and their supplication in heaven thy dwelling place, and maintain their cause, ▼
▼ cause: or, right

verses.text_plain: And forgive thy people that have sinned against thee, and all their transgressions wherein they have transgressed against thee, and give them compassion before them who carried them captive, that they may have compassion on them:
verses.verse_html: 50And forgive thy people that have sinned against thee, and all their transgressions wherein they have transgressed against thee, and give them compassion before them who carried them captive, that they may have compassion on them:

tokens.text: against thee, and all their transgressions

verses.text_plain: For they be thy people, and thine inheritance, which thou broughtest forth out of Egypt, from the midst of the furnace of iron:
verses.verse_html: 51For they be thy people, and thine inheritance, which thou broughtest forth out of Egypt, from the midst of the furnace of iron:

verses.text_plain: That thine eyes may be open unto the supplication of thy servant, and unto the supplication of thy people Israel, to hearken unto them in all that they call for unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 52That thine eyes may be open unto the supplication of thy servant, and unto the supplication of thy people Israel, to hearken unto them in all that they call for unto thee.

tokens.text: unto them in all that they call

verses.text_plain: For thou didst separate them from among all the people of the earth, to be thine inheritance, as thou spakest by the hand of Moses thy servant, when thou broughtest our fathers out of Egypt, O Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 53For thou didst separate them from among all the people of the earth, to be thine inheritance, as thou spakest by the hand of Moses thy servant, when thou broughtest our fathers out of Egypt, O Lord God.

tokens.text: them from among all the people

verses.text_plain: And it was so, that when Solomon had made an end of praying all this prayer and supplication unto the Lord, he arose from before the altar of the Lord, from kneeling on his knees with his hands spread up to heaven.
verses.verse_html: 54And it was so, that when Solomon had made an end of praying all this prayer and supplication unto the Lord, he arose from before the altar of the Lord, from kneeling on his knees with his hands spread up to heaven.

verses.text_plain: And he stood, and blessed all the congregation of Israel with a loud voice, saying,
verses.verse_html: 55And he stood, and blessed all the congregation of Israel with a loud voice, saying,

verses.text_plain: Blessed be the Lord, that hath given rest unto his people Israel, according to all that he promised: there hath not failed one word of all his good promise, which he promised by the hand of Moses his servant.
verses.verse_html:
56Blessed be the Lord, that hath given rest unto his people Israel, according to all that he promised: there hath not failed one word of all his good promise, which he promised by the hand of Moses his servant. ▼
▼ failed: Heb. fallen

tokens.text: according to all that he promised

verses.text_plain: The Lord our God be with us, as he was with our fathers: let him not leave us, nor forsake us:
verses.verse_html: 57The Lord our God be with us, as he was with our fathers: let him not leave us, nor forsake us:

tokens.text: be with us, as he was with our fathers

verses.text_plain: That he may incline our hearts unto him, to walk in all his ways, and to keep his commandments, and his statutes, and his judgments, which he commanded our fathers.
verses.verse_html: 58That he may incline our hearts unto him, to walk in all his ways, and to keep his commandments, and his statutes, and his judgments, which he commanded our fathers.

verses.text_plain: And let these my words, wherewith I have made supplication before the Lord, be nigh unto the Lord our God day and night, that he maintain the cause of his servant, and the cause of his people Israel at all times, as the matter shall require:
verses.verse_html:
59And let these my words, wherewith I have made supplication before the Lord, be nigh unto the Lord our God day and night, that he maintain the cause of his servant, and the cause of his people Israel at all times, as the matter shall require: ▼
▼ at all…: Heb. the thing of a day in his day

footnotes.body_text: ▼ at all…: Heb. the thing of a day in his day
footnotes.body_html: ▼ at all…: Heb. the thing of a day in his day

verses.text_plain: That all the people of the earth may know that the Lord is God, and that there is none else.
verses.verse_html: 60That all the people of the earth may know that the Lord is God, and that there is none else.

verses.text_plain: Let your heart therefore be perfect with the Lord our God, to walk in his statutes, and to keep his commandments, as at this day.
verses.verse_html: 61Let your heart therefore be perfect with the Lord our God, to walk in his statutes, and to keep his commandments, as at this day.

verses.text_plain: And the king, and all Israel with him, offered sacrifice before the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 62And the king, and all Israel with him, offered sacrifice before the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon offered a sacrifice of peace offerings, which he offered unto the Lord, two and twenty thousand oxen, and an hundred and twenty thousand sheep. So the king and all the children of Israel dedicated the house of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 63And Solomon offered a sacrifice of peace offerings, which he offered unto the Lord, two and twenty thousand oxen, and an hundred and twenty thousand sheep. So the king and all the children of Israel dedicated the house of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: The same day did the king hallow the middle of the court that was before the house of the Lord: for there he offered burnt offerings, and meat offerings, and the fat of the peace offerings: because the brasen altar that was before the Lord was too little to receive the burnt offerings, and meat offerings, and the fat of the peace offerings.
verses.verse_html: 64The same day did the king hallow the middle of the court that was before the house of the Lord: for there he offered burnt offerings, and meat offerings, and the fat of the peace offerings: because the brasen altar that was before the Lord was too little to receive the burnt offerings, and meat offerings, and the fat of the peace offerings.

verses.text_plain: And at that time Solomon held a feast, and all Israel with him, a great congregation, from the entering in of Hamath unto the river of Egypt, before the Lord our God, seven days and seven days, even fourteen days.
verses.verse_html: 65And at that time Solomon held a feast, and all Israel with him, a great congregation, from the entering in of Hamath unto the river of Egypt, before the Lord our God, seven days and seven days, even fourteen days.

verses.text_plain: On the eighth day he sent the people away: and they blessed the king, and went unto their tents joyful and glad of heart for all the goodness that the Lord had done for David his servant, and for Israel his people.
verses.verse_html:
66On the eighth day he sent the people away: and they blessed the king, and went unto their tents joyful and glad of heart for all the goodness that the Lord had done for David his servant, and for Israel his people. ▼
▼ blessed: or, thanked
